name: Userlove
description: Empower users with Userlove. Integrate product tours and demos seamlessly. Design interactive tours, record engaging DemoX.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net 'unsafe-eval' blob: data:;
content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms allow-popups allow-modals; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; child-src 'self';
